name: Bullet Chaos
description:
Bullet Chaos A fast-paced bullet hell where you have to dodge projectiles any way you can.

I had a bit of a disaster while making this game, I had barely any time and stuff just generally wasn't working, so I hope you forgive that, but I did try to make it as good as I could with the things that I had.

Controls:

Move: WASD / Arrow Keys / Controller
